title: Local Resource Sharing and Economic Resilience in Timor-Leste Quiz

questions.question: What is the main goal of local resource sharing?
choices: To enhance community resilience and sustainability
To promote competition among community members
questions.answer: To enhance community resilience and sustainability

questions.question: Economic resilience refers to a community's ability to:

Exploit natural resources for short-term gain
